text:
I think it’s limited to a specific HubSpot pricing plan,(or just the CMS and the free utilities)

I think that they can modify the account to add those other privledges but not sure. I think they want to prevent people from using it to actually run things for their business or something isntead of using it as a sandbox
maybe <@U22PKFRU5> or <@U22PJPGK0> can shed light on that
no one tell Google, Inbox for desktop is still working for private users… shhhh :squirrel:
Hello, how i find the blog ID?
I made a few search, the say that i was just copy the number on the URL, in the admin blog page
yeah that's how I'd do it ^
But even though the related posts continue cathing posts from other blogs
make sure its the second number, not the first one
Yes, i am cathing this one
I don't know what could be
yeah that's strange. here's the solution: make everyone use Prettier in their text editor <https://prettier.io/>
autoformat on save is awesome sauce
<@UATE4ATHP> only works with this {{, belive me i try to make this work several times
i havent enabled autoformat on save.  not sure why...
